title: Role-Based Access Control System
headline: Enterprise-grade security platform with dynamic permission management and JWT authentication
searchDescription: Comprehensive RBAC system with dynamic role assignment, permission management, and secure authentication
longDescription: An RBAC system for secure role and permission management. Built with React, Redux, and Express, it provides CRUD for users/roles, JWT authentication, and dynamic access updates for enterprise use.

title: Drive App - Seamless Document Management
headline: Integrated document creation platform with Google Drive synchronization and collaborative editing
searchDescription: Full-stack document management system with Google Drive integration and collaborative editing features
longDescription: A document management app with Google Drive sync. Users can log in with Google OAuth, create/edit docs, and auto-save them as Google Docs. Features JWT sessions, MongoDB storage, and collaboration support.

title: Flight Finder - Smart Travel Companion
headline: Intelligent flight search platform with comprehensive price comparison and secure booking
searchDescription: Comprehensive flight search engine with real-time price comparison for one-way and round-trip bookings
longDescription: A flight search engine with one-way and round-trip options. Built with React and Express, it integrates APIs for real-time prices, Clerk for authentication, and MongoDB for storing user preferences and history.

title: SnapSizzle - Dynamic Media Sharing Platform
headline: Next.js-powered snap application with real-time notifications and seamless media exchange
searchDescription: Modern snap-sharing application with real-time messaging, media sharing, and instant notifications
longDescription: A social platform built with Next.js that enables users to share snaps, media, and messages in real time. Features instant notifications, responsive design, and smooth user experience using Tailwind and Material-UI.

title: ChatSpark - Advanced Real-Time Communication
headline: Feature-rich chat application with real-time translation, video calling, and comprehensive user management
searchDescription: Real-time chat platform with video calling, multi-language translation, and advanced friend management system
longDescription: A real-time chat app with Socket.IO for messaging, WebRTC for video calls, and translation features. Includes friend management, file sharing via Cloudinary, and secure JWT authentication.

title: SmartGenie - AI-Powered Creative Platform
headline: Cutting-edge AI platform combining image generation, RAG-powered chatbot, and intelligent web summarization
searchDescription: AI-powered platform for image generation, website summarization, and intelligent chatbot with RAG system
longDescription: An AI SaaS platform featuring text-to-image generation, web summarization, and a RAG-powered chatbot using LangChain + Pinecone. Includes payment system via Razorpay, JWT auth, and Cloudinary for asset storage.
